article: cardinal bernard law 's resignation as archbishop friday may help ease the sex abuse crisis he mismanaged in boston , but will have less of an impact nationwide as dioceses face scandals of their own making , analysts say .
abstract: catholic sex abuse crisis will continue despite law 's resignation with bc-eu-gen unk abuse
